DataElement.preferredName: Breast Problem Physician Diagnosis Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free-text field to capture another sign of breast disease or disorder as related by the physician to the patient that is not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved._Physician; a licensed medical practitioner._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Property.preferredDefinition: Physician; a licensed medical practitioner.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by S.Shakour. mc 8/24/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/22/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. Modified for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg (JP) 12/2010.
